com.bandyer.core_av.subscriber

Interface Subscriber

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RoomActor

    public Subscriber
extends RoomActor

    This class represents a subscriber to a stream. A subscriber is someone who is in read-only mode on a stream.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.bandyer.core_av.room.RoomActor

        RoomActor.DefaultImpls

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Subscriber addSubscribeObserver(SubscriberObserver observer)
      Method to add an observer to the subscriber. The observer will be notified when a change has occurred
      java.util.List<com.bandyer.core_av.subscriber.SubscriberObserver> getObservers()
      Method to get all subscriber observers
      PubSubOptions getOptions()
      Method to retrieve the subscriber options.
      SubscriberState getState()
      Subscriber state, by default is set to UN_SUBSCRIBED
      Stream getStream()
      Stream binded to this actor
      void releaseView()
      Method to stop a view attached to this subscriber
      Subscriber removeSubscribeObserver(SubscriberObserver observer)
      Method to remove an observer, usually used when not interested anymore in any event coming from the subscriber.
      Subscriber setOptions(PubSubOptions pubSubOptions)
      Method to set how you are interested in the audio/video channels. Example: You may need to subscribe to only audio channel and mute it until something else happens.
      Subscriber setQuality(VideoResolutionQuality videoResolutionQuality, VideoFpsQuality videoFpsQuality)
      Utility method to set the desired resolution and update frequency
      Subscriber setView(StreamView view, OnStreamListener streamListener)
      Utility method to attach a view to the subscriber

      • Methods inherited from interface com.bandyer.core_av.room.RoomActor

        disableAudio, disableVideo, getId, getStream, getView, isAudioDisabled, isVideoDisabled

      • setQuality

        Subscriber setQuality(VideoResolutionQuality videoResolutionQuality,
                      VideoFpsQuality videoFpsQuality)

        Utility method to set the desired resolution and update frequency

        Parameters:
        videoFpsQuality - the fps you want to subscribe to
        videoResolutionQuality - the resolution you are interested in
        Returns:
        Subscriber

      • setOptions

        Subscriber setOptions(PubSubOptions pubSubOptions)

        Method to set how you are interested in the audio/video channels. Example: You may need to subscribe to only audio channel and mute it until something else happens.

        Parameters:
        pubSubOptions - options audio,video enabled andOr muted
        Returns:
        Subscriber

      • getOptions

        PubSubOptions getOptions()

        Method to retrieve the subscriber options.

        Returns:
        pubSubOptions options audio,video enabled andOr muted
